text: phir jab khuda ne unhen najaat dee to vah log zameen par (kadam rakhate hee) phauran naahaq sarakashee karane lagate hain (ai logon tumhaaree sarakashee ka vabaal) to tumhaaree hee jaan par hai - (ye bhee) duniya kee (chand roza) zindagee ka phaayada hai phir aakhir hamaaree (hee) taraph tumako lautakar aana hai to (us vakt) ham tumako jo kuchh (duniya mein) karate the bata dege
